faq.question: Who made Kazwire?
faq.answer: Kazwire was made by students who were fed up with the cumbersome and annoying games sites that most students are forced to use. Our goal is to provide the best unblocked games/proxy experience for free.

faq.question: How do I get new links if they all get blocked?
faq.answer: Join our Discord server and follow the instructions there.

faq.question: How do you guys make money?
faq.answer: We run ads and use the money from them to pay for domains, servers, etc. Currently we are not accepting donations, however boosting our server on Discord will help us out a lot!

faq.question: Is this site safe?
faq.answer: Yes! Your sensitive info is not logged with us and we only collect basic data for analytics and other essential purposes.

faq.question: How can I contribute to Kazwire?
faq.answer: You can make pull requests on our GitHub page or join our Discord server and help us out there. Join the Discord if you have any questions or concerns.

faq.question: I found an issue with the site. What do I do?
faq.answer: Please report it to us on our Discord server or send an email to contact@kazwire.com.

faq.question: How can I add my game to Kazwire?
faq.answer: Contact us! We are always looking for new games to add to our site. You can contact us on our Discord server or send an email to contact@kazwire.com.

faq.question: How can I join the Discord server?
faq.answer: Join at discord.gg/kazwire we post regular updates about the site's status and new additions!
